name: Microvania (Isaac Games)
description: The theme for Blackthornprod Game Jam #3 was "Less is more", so I challenged myself to make a metroidvania on only one screen, and with a palette of only 4 colors. The result is a this cute little puzzle platformer, where each new powerup recontextualizes the space you are navigating. Then, at the end, you have to put all the powerups back, which is a wholly unique challenge as you have to figure out which order they must be returned in, you can't just do it in reverse order. I had a lot of fun making it, and I hope you enjoy it too!
